title: Sweet 'N' Smoky BBQ Chicken Fajitas
keywords: BBQ, Smoky, Chicken, Fajitas, Quick Dinner

method.step: Before you start cooking, take your chicken out of the fridge open the packet and let it air
Deseed your pepper(s) and cut into thin strips
peel and finely slice your Red Onion(s)
Heat a larhe wide based pan with a generous drizzle of olive oil over high heat
once hot, add the pepper strips, sliced onion and chicken breast strips to the pan and cook for 10-12 minutes  or untill the vegetables have softend and the chicken is coocked through
Whilst everything is cooking chop your cherry tomatoes roughly then keep chopping them together untill they resemble a salsa like consistency
Add the chopped tomatoes to a bowl with your chilli flakes. A pinch of salt and a drizzle of olive oil
Stir it all together, this is your salsa
Combine your smoked paprika, corriander and cuminutes  in a bowl with your sugar.  This is your BBQ spice mix
Once the chicken is cooked through, add the BBQ spice mix and the greated garlic to the pan and cook out for 2-3 minutes  or untill fragrent. This is your sweet 'n' smokey BBQ chicken fajita filling
Add your tortillas to a plate and pop them in the microwave for 20 secs or until warmed through
Trim then slice your spring onion(s) finely
Serve the sweet 'n' smokey BBQ chicken fajita filling over the tortilas
Top with the greated cheddar and salsa
Dollop over your natural yoghurt, garnish with the sliced spring onion and onjoy.
